Hell Yeah Burgers is a fast-paced game about cooking and serving up delicious burgers in VR. Under the guidance of professional chef Gianna Remy, you'll take orders, prepare ingrediants, and put your skills to the test.
Founded in Chicago, IL in 2019 by students at Columbia College Chicago!
